verses.text: His foundation \add is\add* in the holy mountains.
The \sc Lord\sc* loveth the gates of Zion More than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious \add things\add* are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: Behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; This \add man\add* was born there.
And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: And the Highest himself shall establish her.
The \sc Lord\sc* shall count, when he writeth \add up\add* the people, \add That\add* this \add man\add* was born there. Selah.
As well the singers as the players on instruments \add shall be there:\add* All my springs \add are\add* in thee.
